articles.title: Google's New Local Search Features Are Finally Here - Search Engine Journal
articles.description: Google is launching several local search features announced months ago at the company's annual Search On conference.
articles.content:
Google is finally rolling out the local search features previewed earlier this year, including the ability to search your surroundings with your phone’s camera.
